column5: I was wondering if any of you go on the chat line
Usually, there is a tuesday night chat. If your in there, put up a post on the main board, and people will join in for sure.  S.
Im in there now, just throwin it out there, ill hang out for a bit and check every now and again if anyone wants to get in there.
I get in there once in a while. On the new forums if you scroll down on the home page (just below active members) you'll see that it lists members who are currently in chat.
